title: Singer Aaron Carter found dead at Lancaster home
dc:creator: Ian James, Richard Winton, August Brown
description: Singer-rapper Aaron Carter was found dead at his home in Southern California. The former child star had struggled with drug use and addiction.
content:encoded: Singer-rapper Aaron Carter was found dead at his home in Southern California. The former child star had struggled with drug use and addiction.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA - AUGUST 19: Singer/songwriter Aaron Carter attends Project Angel Food's 2017 Angel Awards on August 19, 2017 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Alison Buck/Getty Images for Project Angel Food)
